title: ChartContent
description: ChartContent is a container that provides a visual representation of one or more datasets. Should be used when displaying the Chart Floorplan in a non-full-screen context.

Visible.description: Set the visibility of this control.

Separators.description: To provide more flexibility with rendering of controls and sections, set the visibility of the separator lines.

ChartContent.description: Chart Content is interactive. In iOS, we can make it non-interactive by setting the `isReadOnly` flag.

Subtitle.description: Subtitle is not supported in Android and supported only for iOS.

IsReadOnly.description: If enabled, ChartContent section becomes read-only. This is only for iOS.

SeriesTitles.description: If this is absent, data will be picked from the `SeriesTitles` of `ChartView`. `SeriesTitle` is not supported in Android.

SelectedItem.description: This property is only valid for read-only ChartContent section in iOS.

Target.description: Definition of the target binding to dynamically populate the collection. You can also set this to binding/rule to return an array of data items. Note: If this is set to binding/rule, you must return an array of data items, you can't return Target definition.

Title.description: The string value is a style class name of `Title`. iOS only.

Subtitle.description: The string value is a style class name of `Subtitle`. iOS only.

StatusText.description: The string value is a style class name of `StatusText`. iOS only.

CategoryTitles.description: The string value is a style class name of `CategoryTitles`. iOS only.

NoDataText.description: The string value is a style class name of `NoDataText`. Android only. `font-typeface` attribute not supported.

Footer.description: Footer bar to be displayed below this control's content section.

Header.description: Header bar to be displayed above this control's content section.

DataSubscriptions.description: Array of data change events to subscribe to.
